name: SciFi-ish Experience - Horror + RPG
description:
My first uploaded game for my first ever game Jam. This game was make poorly so don't expect too much out of this, but feel free to give me your best criticism. Don't hold back.

This game is support to be a horror + RPG game (even thought the rpg elements was implemented poorly). The theme for this game jam is mix genera so I went the horror and rpg.
